title: Cicada 3301
preview: A global cryptographic puzzle released by an unknown entity, involving steganography, esoterica, and high-level intelligence recruitment speculation.

title: Markovian Parallax Denigrate
preview: A bizarre string of semi-coherent Usenet posts attributed to a possibly fabricated author—remains one of the earliest internet mysteries.

title: Lake City Quiet Pills
preview: A mysterious Reddit user’s death uncovered a suspicious site allegedly hosting mercenary contracts embedded in HTML comments.

title: Unfavorable Semicircle
preview: A YouTube channel that uploaded thousands of cryptic videos with strange audio, timestamps, and abstract visuals—origin and purpose unknown.

title: A858 Stonehenge Redux
preview: A Reddit account posted encrypted strings over years, sparking large decryption efforts; the author eventually ceased activity without explanation.

title: Zodiac Killer
preview: Infamous unidentified serial killer active in California, known for sending taunting cryptic letters and ciphers to newspapers and police.

title: Lars Mittank Disappearance
preview: German tourist vanished from Varna Airport under suspicious circumstances after erratic behavior—captured in chilling CCTV footage.

title: Tamam Shud Case (Somerton Man)
preview: A well-dressed unidentified man found dead on Somerton Beach, with a scrap from the *Rubaiyat* and mysterious codes linked to his case.

title: Brandon Swanson Disappearance
preview: Minnesota student vanished after calling his parents for help from a ditch—despite extensive searches, no trace has been found.
